alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Muskingum; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 21 at 9:23PM EDT until September 21 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON...NORTHERN GUERNSEY...SOUTHEASTERN COSHOCTON...NORTHEASTERN MUSKINGUM AND SOUTHEASTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES... At 922 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Newcomerstown, or 9 miles north of Cambridge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Freeport, Newcomerstown, Antrim, Old Washington, Plainfield, Gilmore, Tippecanoe, Otsego, Birmingham, Boden, and Salt Fork State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
